dsExposomeClient 1.1.1
  • Reference
  • Articles
    • Non-disclosive federated exposome data analysis with DataSHIELD and Bioconductor
  • Changelog

    Reference

    All functions

    checkForExposomeSet()

    Check if object exists on the study server and if it's an ExposomeSet

    checkForExposure()

    Check if exposure exists inside an ExposomeSet

    circos_corPlotEXP()

    Draws correlation circos plot

    corPlot()

    Draws correlation plot

    ds.addPhenoData2ExposomeSet()

    Add Phenotype data to ExpressionSet

    ds.boxPlotGG()

    Renders boxplot

    ds.exposomeSubset()

    Subset Exposome Set by familie(s)

    ds.exposome_HCPC()

    Hierarchical clustering on principal components

    ds.exposome_correlation()

    Extract correlation matrix from Exposome Set exposures

    ds.exposome_pca()

    Principal components analysis of an Exposome Set

    ds.exposome_pca_plot()

    Plot an ExposomeSet PCA

    ds.exposome_scale_exposures()

    Scale ExposomeSet

    ds.exposome_summary()

    Generate the summary of a variable of an exposome dataset

    ds.exposome_variables()

    Get names from the exposures or phenotypes of an Exposome Set of the server side

    ds.exposure_histogram()

    Draw histogram for Exposome Set exposure

    ds.exposures_pData()

    Extract exposure or phenotype data and save them to a data frame

    ds.extractExposomeSetFromImputedSet()

    Extract ExposomeSet from imExposomeSet

    ds.exwas()

    Performs a non-disclosive EXposome-Wide Association Study

    ds.familyNames()

    Get family names from Exposome Set

    ds.imputation()

    Perform a imputation of an Exposome Set

    ds.invExWAS()

    Performs a non-disclosive Inverse EXposome-Wide Association Study

    ds.loadExposome()

    Create an ExposomeSet from data.frames

    ds.normalityTest()

    Normality test of exposures of ExposomeSet

    ds.phenotypeNames()

    Exposure Phenotype names

    ds.plotExwas()

    Plot ExWAS results

    ds.plotFamily()

    Draw boxplot of a family of an Exposome Set of the server side

    ds.plotMissings()

    Draw plot with percentage of missings

    ds.shapiro.test()

    Shapiro-Wilk Normality Test

    ds.standardize()

    Standardize ExposomeSet

    ds.tableMissings()

    Get table of missings per variable

    exwasplotF()

    ExWAS plotter

    matrix_corPlotEXP()

    Draws correlation matrix plot
